        <script>(function (d, w) {
    var supportsSVG = (
        !!d.createElementNS &&
        !!d.createElementNS(
            'http://www.w3.org/2000/svg',
            'svg'
        ).createSVGRect
    );
    var cdnPath = 'https://s3-media4.fl.yelpcdn.com/assets/srv0/svg_icons/76fa4b7a6032/assets/svg_sprite.js';
    var head = d.getElementsByTagName('head')[0];
    function fallback() {
        var link = d.createElement('link');
        link.rel = 'stylesheet';
        link.href = 'https://s3-media3.fl.yelpcdn.com/assets/srv0/svg_icons/b8ee3a431784/assets/sprite.css';
        head.appendChild(link);
    }
    if (!supportsSVG) {
        fallback();
        return;
    }
    if (!w.yelp) {
        w.yelp = {};
    }
    w.yelp.__injectSvgSpritesheet = function (svg) {
        document.body.insertAdjacentHTML('afterbegin', svg);
        delete window.yelp.__injectSvgSpritesheet;
    }
    function onError() {
        d.documentElement.className = [
            d.documentElement.className,
            'icon-svg-unavailable'
        ].join(' ');
        fallback();
        return true;
    }
    var script = d.createElement('script');
    script.async = true;
    script.onerror = onError;
    script.src = cdnPath + '?callback=window.yelp.__injectSvgSpritesheet';
    head.appendChild(script);
}(document, window));</script>

                <form method="get" action="/search" id="header_find_form" class="business-search-form main-search yform u-space-b0 js-business-search-form" role="search">
        <div class="arrange arrange--equal arrange--stack-small">
            <div class="arrange_unit">
                <div class="main-search_suggestions-field search-field-container find-decorator">
                    <label class="pseudo-input business-search-form_input business-search-form_input--find">
                        <div class="pseudo-input_wrapper">
                            <span class="pseudo-input_text business-search-form_input-text">Find</span>
                            <span class="pseudo-input_field-holder">
                                <input autocomplete="off" id="find_desc" maxlength="64" name="find_desc" placeholder="tacos, cheap dinner, Max’s" value="" class="pseudo-input_field business-search-form_input-field" aria-autocomplete="list" tabindex="1">
                            </span>
                        </div>
                    </label>
                    <div class="main-search_suggestions suggestions-list-container search-suggestions-list-container hidden">
                        <ul class="suggestions-list" role="listbox" aria-label="Search results"></ul>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

                <div class="arrange">
                    <div class="arrange_unit arrange_unit--fill">

                        <div class="home-container_section">
    <div class="clearfix layout-block layout-a">
    <div class="column column-alpha js-explore-city_weekly-section">
                        <h3 class="explore-city_title">The Local Yelp</h3>

    <div class="card u-full-width">
        <div class="card_photo">
            
    <div class="photo-box photo-box--interactive photo-box--background" style="background-image: url(https://s3-media4.fl.yelpcdn.com/wphoto/YxPczw0Ge_-t2LBqzqNr2A/h.jpg)">
                <a href="/local_yelp" class="photo-box_link js-analytics-click" data-analytics-label="biz-photo">
                <img alt="Kern T" class="photo-box-img" height="250" src="https://s3-media4.fl.yelpcdn.com/wphoto/YxPczw0Ge_-t2LBqzqNr2A/h.jpg" width="600">

        </a>

    </div>

        </div>
        <div class="card_content">
        <h3 class="u-text-truncate card_content-title--linked">
            <a class="explore-city_weekly-link js-analytics-click" data-analytics-label="local-yelp-title" href="/local_yelp">Mother&#39;s Day Brunch</a>
        </h3>
        <p class="card_content-text">She read you stories. She kissed your boo-boos. She talked you out of that questionable “fashion” choice. (Or, at least, she tried.) And that was just last week! JK. So, what do you get for the woman that gave you life? We think brunch reservations is a great place to start—and these five spots are giving us life right now. Read on to make delicious plans, and don’t forget to book ahead!</p>
        <p class="u-text-subtle">The Local Yelp</p>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="u-space-t2 u-text-centered">
        <a href="/local_yelp" class="explore-city_see-all js-analytics-click" data-analytics-label="link-more">See more</a>
    </div>

    </div>
    <div class="column column-beta js-explore-city_event-section">
                        <h3 class="explore-city_title">Official Yelp Event</h3>
    <div class="card">
        <div class="card_photo">
            
    <div class="photo-box photo-box--interactive photo-box--background" style="background-image: url(https://s3-media3.fl.yelpcdn.com/ephoto/MlWM1QlrKOM3cZp0esia3A/300s.jpg)">
                <a href="/events/vancouver-yelp-vancouver-international-supper-club-filipino-edition" class="photo-box_link js-analytics-click" data-analytics-label="biz-photo">
                <img alt="Yelp Vancouver International Supper Club: Filipino Edition" class="photo-box-img" height="300" src="https://s3-media3.fl.yelpcdn.com/ephoto/MlWM1QlrKOM3cZp0esia3A/300s.jpg" width="300">

        </a>

    </div>

        </div>
        <div class="card_content">
        <h3 class="card_content-title--linked u-text-truncate">
            <a class="explore-city_event-link js-analytics-click" data-analytics-label="featured-event-name" href="/events/vancouver-yelp-vancouver-international-supper-club-filipino-edition">Yelp Vancouver International Supper Club: Filipino Edition</a>
        </h3>
        <p class="card_content-text event-card_description" itemprop="description">
            Hello Vancity!

The Yelp International Supper Club has officially made it's way to Vancouver! What is the ISC you may ask? Why it is an awesome opportunity to try new cuisines from different cultures every month, with people who are genuinely interested in expanding their taste buds. In other words, it's a cool way to meet people who like the same food as you. Plus you get to eat yummy food. Need I say more?

Here are the dirty deets:
Who: All Yelpers + Their awesome food, loving +1
What: An international supper club focused on trying different countries' cuisines every month
Where: Hapag Ihaw-Ihaw Restaurant (This will change every month, depending on what cuisine we're taking on)
When: Thursday, May 18th
Time: 6:30 PM

Important:
- Each club member is responsible for his/her own meal and beverages ... but if you're extra nice, I might pick up a round of drinks or apps or something. :) 
- I strongly recommend bringing cash to all restaurants to make bill-splitting easy. 
- Because I need to make a reservation, RSVP "I'm In" on this page if you are attending (with a real name and photo so I can recognize you please!).
        </p>
        <p class="u-text-truncate u-text-subtle event-card_date">
            Thu, May 18, 6:30 pm
        </p>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="u-space-t2 u-text-centered">
        <a href="/events/vancouver" class="explore-city_see-all js-analytics-click" data-analytics-label="link-more">See all events</a>
    </div>

    </div>
    </div>
        </div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>


    <div class="y-container u-bg-color-alt">
        <div class="y-container_content">
            <div class="home-container home-container--first-top-short home-container--last-bottom-short">

        <div class="home-container_section">
    <div class="clearfix layout-block layout-a">
    <div class="column column-alpha ">
                            <div class="js-rotd">
        <h3 class="boy_title">Review of the Day</h3>

        <div class="island island--light rotd">
                <div class="ypassport arrange arrange--12 u-space-b3">
                    <div class="arrange_unit">
                                    <div class="photo-box pb-60s" data-hovercard-id="VExOs1vQA05CZxwxSjtM4g">

        </a>

    </div>



                    </div>
                    <div class="arrange_unit arrange_unit--fill">
                        <strong>

                        </strong>
                        

    <ul class="user-passport-stats user-passport-stats--inline">
        <li class="friend-count">
            <span aria-hidden="true" style="fill: #f15c00; width: 18px; height: 18px;" class="icon icon--18-friends icon--size-18">

    </svg>

            <b>36</b>
        </li>

        </li>

    </ul>

                        <div class="rotd_text">
                            Wrote a review for

        <span class="business-link-hovercard_business-link js-business-link">

        </span>

        </a>

    </div>



        </div>
        <div class="media-story">
                <div class="media-title clearfix">

                    <div class="u-text-alpha badge-banner badge-banner--blue">
        Review of the Day
        <img src="https://s3-media1.fl.yelpcdn.com/assets/srv0/yelp_styleguide/8bb21835695e/assets/img/badge_banner_icons/40x40_rotd.png" srcset="https://s3-media4.fl.yelpcdn.com/assets/srv0/yelp_styleguide/73138b2d66b5/assets/img/badge_banner_icons/40x40_rotd@2x.png 2x" width="40" class="badge-banner_img" role="presentation">
    </div>


                <div class="u-space-t3 u-space-b3">
                        <div class="biz-rating biz-rating-large clearfix">
        <div >
                



    <div class="i-stars i-stars--regular-5 rating-large" title="5.0 star rating">
        <img class="offscreen" height="303" src="https://s3-media1.fl.yelpcdn.com/assets/srv0/yelp_design_web/41341496d9db/assets/img/stars/stars.png" width="84" alt="5.0 star rating">
    </div>


        </div>
            <span class="rating-qualifier">
        2/1/2017
    </span>

    </div>

                </div>

                <p class="rotd_comment-text">
                        Je suis mort et suis allé au ciel ici...and I would willingly die a thousand more. I have a (bad) feeling I&#39;m going to become this place&#39;s best customer.  A little backstory: Despite my foodie sense and experience, I had never tasted a macaron. Yea, I know, I know. How? Well the truth is I had held out for a good one all this time. The last time I was in France, my mission was set at finding the perfect Parisienne cr...
                        <a href="/biz/french-made-baking-vancouver?hrid=6M8IGscJ76Ief1p8grMqnw" class="rotd_read-more js-analytics-click" data-analytics-label="read more">Continue reading</a>
                </p>
        </div>

        <p class="u-text-centered">
            <a class="boy_more-link js-analytics-click" href=/browse/reviews/picks data-analytics-label="archive">Read previous reviews</a>
        </p>
    </div>

    </div>
    <div class="column column-beta ">
